Package server

Class DBUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DBUserController
  • public class DBUserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for all functions relating to users, such as login, creating an account , logout, adding users to their relative DB (hr to hr table), loading of users, and checking of input Used in src/gui/branch_manager, src/gui/hr, src/gui/restaurant with the controllers in src/controllers/managment
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    danny aibi

      • userLogin

        protected void userLogin​(java.lang.String[] res,
                         ConnectionToClient client,
                         java.sql.Connection myCon,
                         DBController db)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Func for logging user in , when user logs in we update IsLoggedIn to 1
        Parameters:
        res - res[0] used to start function, rest of res for details we need for queries,
        res - [0]=""User_login"" ,
        res - [1...]= user name and password from user
        client - The connection from which the message originated.
        myCon - the connection to mySql DB
        db - the main database controller used in order to send message back to client
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • privateOrBusinessAccountReg

        protected void privateOrBusinessAccountReg​(java.lang.String[] res,
                                           ConnectionToClient client,
                                           java.sql.Connection myCon,
                                           DBController db)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Func for registering either a private account or business account here we call account reg for account details and than create private or business account according to res[0]
        Parameters:
        res - res[0] used to start function, rest of res for details we need for queries,
        res - [0]="Business_account" OR res[0]="Private_account
        res - [1..]=Business account toString OR res[1...]=Private account toString"
        client - The connection from which the message originated.
        myCon - the connection to mySql DB
        db - the main database controller used in order to send message back to client
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
